program.title: FHA HB 30-Year Fixed Mortgage
program.description: Secure your primary home with an FHA HB 30-Year Fixed Mortgage. Affordable monthly payments, low down payment options, and government-backed financing.

content_blocks.heading: Why choose an FHA Loan?
content_blocks.content: FHA loans are a great option for first-time homebuyers or those with lower credit scores. Because they are insured by the Federal Housing Administration, lenders can offer more competitive rates and lower down payment requirements.

content_blocks.heading: Program Benefits
items: Higher loan limits for High-Balance areas

content_blocks.heading: Eligibility Criteria
items: DTI ratio below 43% in most cases
Must be for a Primary Residence

cta_banner.text: Ready to get started with an FHA loan?
